entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Showers beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
